item.title: Lack of signage re pedestrians, 9th October
item.description:
Since Walnut Tree Road has been resurfaced there is no allocated place for people including students and school kids on the way to the college and station to cross. Cars come round that bend off the roundabout very quickly and there is no signage warning them to slow down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walnut Tree Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Turkish kebab shopkeeper, scoffs grill delivery vehicle parking on pedestrian crossing on a daily basis driving a nearly hitting pedestrians as he mounts the pedestrian crossing to park a vehicle illegally., 9th October
item.description:
Illegal parking anti-social behavior

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wick Road, Hackney, London

item.title: There is a silver car which has been there for years, 9th October
item.description:
There is a Silver car as you drive into Meldrum close which has been there for years. It's not taxed and doesn't have a MOT. The window is always open and no one drives it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meldrum Close, Ramsden, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Can the housing officer Denise Corbin please explain why residents and Leaseholders are paying service charges and communal lighting when there is No street light on Inglesham Walk. Residence feel unsafe and insecure of a night when it is very dark I'm scared to go out., 9th October
item.description:
Denise Corbin do your duty and serve the community get this fixed.No street light on Inglesham Walk.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southmoor Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light too bright, 9th October
item.description:
The street light is right outside our bedroom and needs a hood installed. Also on the same lamp post the street sign is wonky and the flag needs to be removed as it is noisy at night in the wind.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Road, Slade Green, London

item.title: What is the hackney council housing manager Denise Corbin doing about this fly tipping in the area. Housing manager is very incompetent at her dutiesA resident MS JOANNE REID called early today to report that the waste man dumped all her Waste Recyling materials near the corner of her property and that when she approached him, he just shun him retorting that he does not care. He wants this removed immediately considering that mice and foxes will turn the area into a feasting place., 9th October
item.description:
Clean up team required.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southmoor Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous flytipping, 9th October
item.description:
There is always large waste dumped behind the Adams Garden Estate bins, opposite Brunel Museum. The area needs to be blocked off as items are frequently dangerous. This happens constantly and has been a problem for years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A101, Rotherhithe, London
